channel.title: Dinner on Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Dinner on Recipes

item.title: Brazilian Stew
item.description: Ingredients 1 tablespoon oil 1 medium onion, chopped 2 cloves garlic, minced 2 sweet potatoes, peeled, diced 1 large red bell pepper, diced 1 cans diced tomatoes 1 hot green chili pepper, diced 2 cups vegetable stock plus 1 1/2 cups of water 2 cans black beans Serve and top with: 1 mango, peeled and diced 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro 1 lime (or whatever you want) Directions Cook onion, garlic, sweet potato and bell pepper until soft.

item.title: Chicken Piccata
item.description: Ingredients 2 large boneless and skinless chicken breasts, halved horizontally to make 4 2 tablespoons flour (all purpose or plain) 2 tablespoons finely grated fresh Parmesan cheese 1 teaspoon salt Cracked pepper For The Sauce: Light spray of cooking oil 1 tablespoon olive oil 2 teaspoons butter (or oil) 2 tablespoons minced garlic 1¼ cup chicken broth (stock) ½ cup milk (full fat or 2% – or use reduced fat cream or heavy cream) ⅓ cup finely grated fresh Parmesan cheese 2 tablespoons capers (plus 2 tablespoons extra to garnish) 1 teaspoon cornstarch (cornflour) mixed with 1 tablespoon of water 2-3 tablespoons lemon juice – juice of 1 lemon (adjust to your tastes) 2 tablespoons fresh parsley Directions Lightly spray pan/skillet with a light coating of cooking oil spray and heat over medium-hight heat.

item.title: Chili - Sweet Potato and Black Bean
item.description: Ingredients Olive oil Medium onion, diced 2 garlic cloves, minced 1 large sweet potato, peeled and diced Large can (28 oz) diced tomatoes 2 cans black beans 2 cups water 2 T mild chili powder (or 1 if too spicy) 2 tsp paprika 2 tsp cumin 1 tsp salt Directions Saute onion in oil until transparent, 3-4 minutes Add garlic and sweet potato, 2 minutes Add spices, stir and let coat sweet potatoes Add tomatoes, beans, water Bring to a boil Simmer uncovered, 20-25 minutes

item.title: Fettuccine with Shrimp
item.description: Ingredients 2 T. Olive oil 1 medium onion sliced thinly Dash of peperoncino 1 can petite diced tomatoes 1/3 c. White wine Salt, pepper, rosemary 1 lb. shrimp (8-10 per person, depending on size) 1/2 lb fettuccine, cooked al dente Basil Directions Sauté onion in oil until transparent Add peperoncino, tomatoes and wine Cook down Add salt, pepper, rosemary and shrimp Cook until shrimp is pink Add this to cooked pasta and serve Top with basil or parsley

item.title: Gnocchi Verdi: Spinach and Ricotta Gnocchi
item.description: Description Spinach and ricotta gnocchi with butter and sage sauce Ingredients 1 pkg frozen, chopped spinach, thawed, cooked (3 minutes in microwave) and water squeezed out 1 lb. ricotta cheese 1 egg 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese 3/4 cup flour 1 tsp salt 1/2 tsp nutmeg 4 T unsalted butter 1T fresh sage (dried can be substituted) Directions Mix together spinach, ricotta, egg, nutmeg and salt Fold in 4 Tablespoons Parmesan and 1/2 c flour Spread 1/4 c flour on a plate Drop 1/2 t.

item.title: One Pot Enchilada
item.description: Ingredients 1 cup quinoa 1 can black beans 1 sweet potato, 1/2" pieces 2 cups corn (can be frozen) 1 can diced tomatoes 1 can/packet enchilada sauce (10 oz) 1/2 cup water (we usually need more, probably closer to a cup) 2 cups kale or spinach (optional) 1/2 cup shredded cheese (optional) Seasoning: 1 tsp chili powder 1 tsp cumin 1/2 tsp paprika 1/4 tsp onion powder 1/4 tsp garlic powder salt to taste Directions Put all in a pan/pot Bring to boil Reduce to simmer Cover Cook 20 min or until quinoa is done, stirring occasionally.

item.title: Pasta alla Puttanesca
item.description: Ingredients 2 T. oil 4 cloves garlic, minced 1/4 c. chopped olives 1/4 c. capers 1 t. red pepper flakes 1 can tuna 1 can diced tomatoes Juice of 1/2 lemon zest of lemon Parsley 1/2 lb pasta Directions no directions included Variations David and Stephanie make this with spaghetti squash; no tuna or lemon. We use kalamata olives.

item.title: Pasta con Panna, Prosciutto, e Piselli
item.description: Description Pasta with cream, ham/prosciutto, and peas Ingredients 1 lb spaghetti 1 c. diced ham 1 pk. frozen peas 1 stick butter 1 quart half and half 1 c cheese salt pepper Directions Melt butter, cook ham and peas in butter Add cream Cook spaghetti Add spaghetti to cream mixture, cook while stirring Toss with 1 c. cheese, salt, pepper to taste

item.title: Red Lentil Soup
item.description: Description Warm Lentil soup fixes all ailments. Ingredients 1 cup red lentils 2 carrots 1 onion 1 box of vegetable broth (4 cups) 1 tsp cumin 2 tsp tumeric 1/2 tsp salt (hot pepper if you like hot pepper) Directions rinse lentils dice vegetables cook onion until soft add vegetables and cook for a few minutes add spices and cook until fragrant Add rinsed lentils, stir add broth Bring everything to a boil then simmer for ~1 hour Grind using immersion blender or leave chunky
